scripts.stage:deploy-frontend: pnpm i && pnpm --filter foundry-dashboard run stage:deploy
scripts.production:deploy-frontend: pnpm i && pnpm --filter foundry-dashboard run production:deploy
scripts.stage:deploy-data-service: pnpm i && pnpm run build-package && pnpm --filter data-service run stage:deploy
scripts.production:deploy-data-service: pnpm i && pnpm run build-package && pnpm --filter data-service run production:deploy
scripts.foundry:dev: pnpm run foundry:dev-dashboard & pnpm run foundry:dev-engine
scripts.foundry:deploy-dashboard: pnpm i && pnpm --filter foundry-dashboard run deploy
scripts.foundry:deploy-engine: pnpm i && pnpm --filter foundry-engine run deploy
scripts.foundry:deploy: pnpm run foundry:deploy-dashboard && pnpm run foundry:deploy-engine
